meanings.definition: A facial expression made by moving the muscles around the eyes and mouth to show happiness or amusement.
meanings.sent1: She greeted me with cheerful smilies.
meanings.sent2: I love to see her smilies when she's happy.
meanings.sent3: His smilies were so contagious that everyone around started smiling too.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with smilies as she shared the good news.
meanings.sent5: The child's innocent smilies brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: A small digital image or icon used in electronic communication to convey an emotion or facial expression.
meanings.sent1: He sent me a text full of cute smilies.
meanings.sent2: I always add smilies to my messages to express my feelings.
meanings.sent3: The email had a funny smilie that made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The smilies in the chat made the conversation more lively.
meanings.sent5: Her favorite smilie was the one with heart eyes.
